display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Non-Supine): Apneas with >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal / hour of sleep in non-supine position from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hrop3 + hnrop3 + carop3 + canop3 + oarop3 + oanop3 ) / ( remepop + nremepop )
